name: Rogue Ruins
description:
Rogue Ruins

[This is a short Demo/Prototype !  Comments and input are GREATLY appreciated! Stay tuned for the full game]

CONTROLS - Move with WASD, jump with SPACE, dash with LSHIFT, and attack with K. 

Enemies flash dark colors when they're about to attack!

Reach inaccessible areas by combining a dash and a sloped surcace.
